#summary SrvAuth user authentication services

= Introduction =

SrvAuth provides user authentication for the other services


= Modules =

|| *MODULE* || *ACCESS LEVEL* || *DESCRIPTION*||
|| dumpusers || A_SRA || Dumps registered users. ||
|| confirm || A_PENDING || Verifies your email. ||
|| unregister || A_HELPER || Unregisters an account ||
|| info || A_AUTHED || Returns information about a handle ||
|| promote || A_HELPER || Sets user services access. ||
|| reauth || A_NONE || Re-logs you into services after split (INTERNAL COMMAND) ||
|| whoami || [A_NONE || Gives you information about yourself, including services info ||
|| auth || A_NONE || Logs you into services. ||
|| whois || A_HELPER || Gives you information about a user ||
|| changepass || A_PENDING || Changes your password. ||
|| register || A_NONE || Registers your account with services||
